column4: So...if one wanted to install Gutsy Server and needed a disk controller driver, but has no access to a floppy drive.  How would one do that? :)
I think theoretically you can put the image of a floppy disk on a usb disk, then trick the installer into thinking that it is actually a floppy disk.
- any pointers on how to fool it into thinking a usb drive is a floppy?
